smoochBot.descriptionGreeting: Ujumbe wa kwanza unaotumiwa mtumiaji. Unatambulisha shirika lako na huduma unayotoa kupitia boti hii.
smoochBot.descriptionInactive: Ujumbe huu unatumwa kwa mtumiaji yeyote anayetuma ujumbe kwenye vidikezo wakati boti ya ujumbe ya Check inalemazwa.
smoochBot.descriptionInvalidFormat: Ujumbe wa kiotomatiki unaotumwa kwa mtumiaji anapotuma faili isiyokubaliwa na Check.
smoochBot.descriptionMainMenu: Menyu inayomuuliza mtumiaji kuchagua kati ya seti ya chaguzi. Ujumbe huu hufuata moja kwa moja ujumbe wa Salamu. 9 haiwezi kutumiwa kama chaguo katika menyu kuu.
smoochBot.descriptionOptionNotAvailable: Ujumbe unaotumwa iwapo jibu la mtumiaji kwa menyu ni batili kwa mazingira ya menyu.
smoochBot.descriptionPrivacyStatementCon: Maudhui ya faragha. Hariri maandishi hapa chini, au ubadilishe na yaliyomo maalum.
smoochBot.descriptionPrivacyStatementGre: Kwa chaguo-msingi, Taarifa ifuatayo ya Faragha inapatikana kwa watumiaji wote. Wakati wa kuibadilisha na moja ya kawaida, lazima ufanye hivyo kwa kila lugha bot yako inafanya kazi.
Chaguo '9' lazima irejeshwe kwa watumiaji kufikia Taarifa ya Faragha kwenye menyu kuu.
smoochBot.descriptionQueryPrompt: Ujumbe unaoomba mtumiaji kuwasilisha maudhui kwa uhakiki.
smoochBot.descriptionQueryReceived: Uthibitisho unaotumwa kwa mtumiaji baada ya swali halali kutoka kwa mtumiaji umepokelewa.
smoochBot.descriptionReportUpdated: Ujumbe unaotumwa kwa mtumiaji hali ya ripoti inapobadilika. Ripoti lazima ikamilishwe ili ujumbe huu uweze kutumwa.
smoochBot.descriptionSecondaryMenu: Menyu hiari inayouliza mtumiaji kuchagua kutoka kwa seti ya chaguo. Mtumiaji anapojibu na mojawapo wa chaguo, boti inaweza kutuma ripoti au kumwelekeza hadi ujumbe wa boti nyingine.
smoochBot.descriptionSubscription: Present the value of your newsletter to users. All users who opt-in will receive any future newsletter.
smoochBot.footnoteGreeting: Taarifa na chaguo zifuatazo zitaongezwa kiotomatiki mwishoni mwa ujumbe huu: 'Hatutashiriki habari zako zinazokutambua. Jibu 9 kusoma taarifa yetu ya Faragha na Kusudi'.
smoochBot.footnoteGreeting2: Taarifa ya faragha ya msingi inaweza kubadilishwa na ile ya kawaida chini ya chaguo 'Taarifa ya Faragha' kwenye ukurasa huu.
smoochBot.placeholderGreeting: Halo! Karibu kwenye [Name of your organization] kwa boti la kuangalia ukweli.
smoochBot.placeholderInactive:
❌Asante kwa ujumbe wako. Huduma yetu ya uthibitishaji *imelemazwa kwa sasa.*

Wasiliana nasi kwa *[email or other contact]* kwa maswali zaidi.
smoochBot.placeholderInvalidFormat:
❌Samahani, hatuwezi kukubali aina hii ya ujumbe kwa uthibitisho kwa wakati huu.

Tunaweza kukubali picha nyingi, video, viungo, jumbe za maandishi, na jumbe za WhatsApp zilizoshirikiwa.
smoochBot.placeholderMainMenu:
📌* Menyu kuu* 

*Jibu 1* (au 🔍) tuma ombi lako kwa uthibitishaji kuhusu nakala, video, picha, au maudhui.
*Jibu 2* (au 🦠) kupata taarifa za hivi punde kuhusu ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona 
(COVID-19)
smoochBot.placeholderOptionNotAvailable: 🤖 Samahani, sikuuelewa ujumbe wako. Tafadhali jaribu tena!
smoochBot.placeholderQueryPrompt:
* Tafadhali ingiza swali, kiunga, picha, video au sauti ambayo unataka kukaguliwa kwa ukweli, * ikifuatiwa na muktadha wowote unaohusiana na kitu hicho. Ombi lako litatumwa kwa wachunguzi wa ukweli karibu sekunde 15 baada ya ujumbe wako wa mwisho.

* Jibu 0 (au 📌) * kughairi na kurudi kwenye * Menyu kuu *
smoochBot.placeholderQueryReceived:
Asante! Ombi lako limepokelewa. Majibu yanakusanywa na kutatuliwa, na tunashugulika kuyathibitisha maswali yako.

✔️*Fuata kiungo kwa orodha iliyosasishwa ya maswali ya kawaida ambayo tumeyathibitisha:* [ Unganisha kwa ukurasa wa kuthibitisha kwenye tovuti yako ]

👉 *Jibu na maandishi yoyote* kurejea hadi *Menu Kuu*📌
smoochBot.placeholderSecondaryMenu:
*Ujumbe kuhusu ugonjwa wa vizuri vya korona (COVID-19)* 🦠

👉 *Jibu na nambari yoyote kati ya nambari zinazofuata (ama emoji) kupata maelezo zaidi kuhusu mada hii:*

*1:* Nawezaje kujikinga au kukinga familia yangu?👨‍👩‍👧
*2:* Nadhani kuwa nimeanza kuwa mgonjwa 🤒
*3:* Nawezaje kushughulikia dhiki inayotokana na COVID-19? ❤️
*4:* Maelezo kuhusu visa na uponaji kimataifa 📊
*5:* Taarifa za hivi punde kutoka kwa Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni 🌐

*Jibu na 0* kurudi hadi *Menyu kuu*📌
smoochBot.placeholderSubscription: Type to compose your prompt for newsletter opt-in.
smoochBotComponent.missingInformationBod: The message 'Newsletter opt-in and opt-out' is missing a placeholder.
smoochBotComponent.title: Tipline
smoochBotConfig.subscriptionHeader: You are currently {subscription_status} to our newsletter.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.addMoreIn: This message is sent to user after they send content, to make sure all the information they want to submit has been provided.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.error: The placeholder {subscription_status} is missing from your custom content or translation
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.feedbackD: Are these fact-checks answering your question?
After fact-checks are returned to the user, the bot automatically follows up to ask if the results are satisfactory.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.greetings: Welcome to our fact-checking bot. Use the main menu to navigate.
Ujumbe wa kwanza unaotumiwa mtumiaji. Unatambulisha shirika lako na huduma unayotoa kupitia boti hii.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.moreConte: This message is sent when user selects the option to add more content.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.negativeF: Thank you for your feedback. Journalists on our team have been notified and you will receive an update in this thread if a new fact-check is published.
If the user is not satisfied, this message informs the user that the content has been sent to journalists.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.newslette: Subscribe now to get the most important facts delivered directly on WhatsApp, every week. {subscription_status}.
This message informs user about their subscription status. You must keep the placeholders as is (do not translate content within brackets).
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.noSearchR: No fact-checks have been found. Journalists on our team have been notified and you will receive an update in this thread if the information is fact-checked.
If the bot doesn't find any relevant fact-checks in your database, it informs users that the content has been sent to journalists.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.noticeOfI: Our bot is currently inactive. Please visit *insert URL* to read the latest fact-checks.
If the tipline is set to inactive, this message is sent in response to any user message.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.optionNot: I'm sorry, I didn't understand your message.
The message sent if the user response is not a valid option.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.placehold: Type custom content or translation here.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.positiveF: Thank you! Spread the word about this tipline to help us fight misinformation! *insert_entry_point_link*
If the user is satisfied, this message's purpose is to thank them for their feedback.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.submissio: Please enter the question, link, picture, or video that you want to be fact-checked.
This message prompts the user to submit content for a fact-check.
Thank you! Looking for fact-checks, it may take a minute.
The confirmation sent to the user after the content is submitted.
smoochBotContentAndTranslation.timeoutDe: Thank you for reaching out to us! Type any key to start a new conversation.
After 15 minutes of inactivity, this message is sent to users to close the conversation.
smoochBotIntegrationButton.confirmDiscon: Disconnecting this {platform} account will prevent any user to interact with the tipline through that account.
Warning! Disconnecting a WhatsApp number is permanent. You will not be able to reconnect it after it is disconnected.
smoochBotIntegrationButton.disclaimer: We don't store this information. This is just used to configure the integration.
smoochBotIntegrationButton.disclaimerFor: Before proceeding, make sure that you are logged in the {platform} account you wish to connect to the tipline.
smoochBotIntegrations.entryPointDescript: Use this address anywhere online to open WhatsApp and start a tipline conversation:
smoochBotIntegrations.lineWebhook: Copy this webhook URL to your LINE settings
smoochBotIntegrations.qrCodeDescription: Use this code or download the image to display the QR code on online or offline promotion. Scanning the QR code opens WhatsApp and starts a tipline conversation.
smoochBotIntegrations.title: Messaging services
smoochBotIntegrations.twitterDisabled: The integration with Twitter is currently not available, following changes to the Twitter API on April 21, 2023.

userConfirmed.alreadyConfrimMessage: Oops! Your account is already confirmed. Please sign in to get started.
userConfirmed.confrimMessage: Asante kwa kuthibitisha anwani yako ya barua pepe! Sasa unaweza kuingia.

userEmail.text: To send you notifications, we need your email address. If you'd like to receive notifications, please enter your email address. Otherwise, click 'Skip'

userInfoEdit.addLinkHelper: Ongeza kiungo kwa ukurasa wa wavuti au wasifu wa mtandao wa kijamii. Kumbuka: hii haiaathiri mbinu yako ya kuingia.
userInfoEdit.editError: Samahani, hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kusasisha wasifu. Tafadhali jaribu tena na uwasiliane na {supportEmail} iwapo hali itaendelea.
userPrivacy.deleteAccountConfirmationTex: Una uhakika? Hii itatoa akaunti yako na kukuondoa kwenye programu-tumizi
userPrivacy.deleteAccountText: Iwapo utafuta akaunti yako, maelezo yako ya kibinafsi yatafutwa. Maoni, maelezo, na shughuli za eneo la kazi zitakuwa na jina bandia na kusalia kwa {appName}
userPrivacy.description: Tafadhali hakiki {ppLink} yeyu kujifunza jinsi {appName} inatumia na kuhifadhi maelezo yako.
userPrivacy.seeInformationText: Tutakutumia faili yenye maudhui na data uliyounda na kutoa kwenye {appName}. Hii inaweza kuhifadhiwa kama rekodi zako au kuhamishwa hadi huduma nyingine.
userPrivacy.stopProcessingText: Unaweza kuomba {appName} kusitisha uchakataji wa maelezo yako chini ya hali fulani.
userPrivacy.title: Maelezo yako
userSecurity.authenticateDescription: Ingiza nenosiri lako la sasa ili kuthibitisha utambulisho wako:
userSecurity.backupDescription: Tunapendekeza sana utoe na kuchapisha misimbo ya chelezo kwa kutumia kitufe hapa chini. Hizi ni nambari za matumizi ya mara moja zitakazotumika badala ya uthibitishaji wa mara-2 iwapo utakosa ufikiaji kwa kifaa chako cha uthibitishaji wa mara-2.
userSecurity.backupNote: Kumbuka: Misimbo ya chelezo itabatilishwa kwa kubonyeza kitufe hiki.
userSecurity.disableAuthenticateDescript: Ingiza nenosiri lako kulemaza uthibitishaji wa mara-mbili:
userSecurity.downloadDescription: Utahitaji programu tumizi ya uthibitishaji wa mara-mbili, kama vile programu ya Google Authenticator, kwenye simu yako mahiri ili kuendelea:
userSecurity.failedfulLoginText: Pokea arifu za {loginTrial} majaribio ya kuingia yaliyoshindwa mfululizo
userSecurity.qrcodeDescription: Ukitumia programu tumizi yako ya uthibitishaji mara-mbili, changanua msimbo wa QR:
userSecurity.successfulLoginText: Pokea arifu za kuingia kutoka eneo jipya au kifaa
userSecurity.suggestTwoFactorForSocialAc: Ili kuwezesha 2FA, unahitaji kuunda nenosiri kwenye Check. Tafadhali fanya hivyo kwenye sehemu ya "Badilisha nenosiri" hapo chini.
userSecurity.verifyDescription: Kuwezesha uthibitishaji wa mara-mbili, ingiza msimbo wa tarakimu 6 kutoka kwa programu tumizi yako ya uthibitishaji wa mara-mbili:
userTooltip.dateJoined: Imeunganishwa {date} • {teamsCount, plural, =0 {eneo la kazi} moja {eneo 1 la akzi} nyingine {maeneo # ya kazi}}
userTos.commGuidelines: Tunakuomba pia usome {communityGuidelinesLink} yetu ya kutumia {appName}.
userTos.disclaimer: Tafadhali hakiki {tosLink} yetu na {ppLink} yetu na kubali yafuatayo:
userTos.disclaimerUpdate: Tumesasisha {tosLink} yetu na {ppLink} yetu. Tafadhali hakiki na ukubali yafuatayo:

webPageMediaCard.Error: Kipengee hiki hakiwezi kutambuliwa. Inaweza kuwa imeondolewa, au inaweza tu kuonekana kwa watumiaji ambao wameingia. Bonyeza kiungo hapo juu ili uende kwenye hiyo.
